title: NYC FC Soccer Fans Bemoan Home Playoff Game Away From Home
text:
Fans of New York City’s professional soccer team NYC FC should be reveling as their first-place team starts the playoffs on Wednesday. But a number of supporters are miffed that the game is being played 10 miles from where it should be.

NYC FC plays its home games at Yankee Stadium in the Bronx, which it shares with the borough’s baseball team. With the Yankees playing into the postseason and having first rights to the field, the stadium wasn’t ready to host NYC FC’s home game against Toronto FC. Instead, the match will be...
description: Postseason baseball at Yankee Stadium means Wednesday’s soccer game will be held at the home of the New York Mets.
